lines.text:
YES, I KILLED THEM. HOW ELSE
                COULD
I GET WHAT I NEEDED-- SERUMS,
MAD, YOU SAY! YOU SHALL SEE HOW
MAD I AM. YOU SHALL SEE WHAT
NO MAN HAS SEEN BEFORE-- THE

IN AN AGONY OF APPREHENSION I
                STRAIND AT MY

BUT IT WAS TOO LATE! IT FELL
                AND EX-

AS THE FRIGHTFUL LIQUID
                SETTLED ON THE DIS-

MEMBERED PARTS OF THE BODIES
                IN THAT AWFUL

WITH ONE ACCORD THE FRIGHTFUL
                THINGS
